body_html: Yeah, I think if we can find out for what n the amortised cost of setup + alias sampling is better than sampling, we can choose to do alias sampling for all n greater than than that n. Does this sound reasonable or am I missing something?
body_text:
Yeah, I think if we can find out for what n the amortised cost of setup +
alias sampling is better than sampling, we can choose to do alias sampling
for all n greater than than that n. Does this sound reasonable or am I
missing something?
body:
Yeah, I think if we can find out for what n the amortised cost of setup +
alias sampling is better than sampling, we can choose to do alias sampling
for all n greater than than that n. Does this sound reasonable or am I
missing something?
